description: This Kotlin source file defines an Android activity called NotesListActivity, which displays a list of notes, allows adding new notes, editing existing ones, and deleting notes through a user interface. It manages interaction with the NotesRepository and handles UI updates.

classes.name: NotesListActivity
classes.description: Main activity displaying list of notes with options to add, edit, and delete notes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components and event handlers.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Refreshes the list of notes when the activity comes to the foreground.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches all notes from repository and updates the list view and empty view visibility.

methods.name: showDeleteDialog
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog before deleting a note.

inner_classes.name: NotesAdapter
inner_classes.description: Custom adapter to display notes in the ListView.

methods.name: setItems
methods.description: Sets the list of notes and refreshes the adapter.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Returns the note at a given position.

methods.name: getItemId
methods.description: Returns the stable ID for the item at the given position.

methods.name: getView
methods.description: Creates or updates the view for each list item.
